quote_last: , tick-tock, eight-one o’clock, off to school, off to work, run, run, eight-one!
title: There Will Come Soft Rains
author: Ray Bradbury

quote_last: Dore Peretz’ chest still felt like it was on fire, a burning sensation that seemed to spread across the entire front of his torso; in fact, he felt like shit.
title: Project Cyclops
author: Thomas Hoover
